entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 25 February 2023
